name: Junglex
description:
Rex got lost in this hostile jungle! Help him finish the levels and leave this place!

Junglex is a platform game with a high level of difficulty that will put your nerves to the test!

Can you get out of this jungle?



Features:

■ 100 different levels!
■ 2 different biomes!
■ Many enemies and boss!
■ Difficult!
■ Addictive!
